name: SNOWPLOW RESCUE
description:
A deep snow has settled over the city, and people need help! Clear the road from the hospital to the house to win. You have a powerful snowplow that can move loads of snow, but it can't move piles that are too big.  Keep the biggest piles off the roadway so emergency personnel can make their way through to the house.

Made in under three hours during Trijam #98: The Three Hour Game Jam!

Team Size: 2
